features: Professional Santoku Knife: This imarku Super Sharp Santoku Knife is made of Jananese HC stainless steel that resists rust, corrosion, and discoloration. It can be used for your daily kitchen tasks of chopping, slicing, dicing, and mincing of all kinds of meat, vegetables, fruits, and bread. It is suitable for both home and restaurant kitchens.

Ultra-Sharp Edge: Sharpness is key. The professional knife blade polishing makes this Japanese knife be more sharper than others, and it has been proven its ability to withstand the rigors of tough restaurant use. The thickness of this kitchen knife is 2.5mm. Its hand-polished edge is 15-18 degrees per side, which is sturdy and sharp to get the job done perfectly.

Hollow Edge Design: The 7-inch santoku chef knife scalloped hollow edge is add gap between the knife blade and the material being cut, keeping things from sticking to the knife blade, special for slicing, dicing, and mincing.

Ergonomic Design: Advanced Pakkawood Handle manufacturing process minimizes wrist tension while providing a secure, comfortable grip no matter your hand size or where you grip. Special texture, smoothly. Compare to other Pakkawood, it is way more stable and sanitary, No expantion, no crack like traditional wood and pakkawood handle, which asures you the best food safety.

The Perfect Gifts: The knife comes in a high-end black gift box, making it the perfect gift for whoever you love. Our kitchen knife product provides worry-free purchasing for customers with our after-sales support offering a 3-month free refund and 1-year free exchange service.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About This Multi-function Santoku Knife: imarku 7 inches santoku knife is designed for professionals who include chefs, culinary experts, food caterers as well as and ordinary people. It is a multipurpose knife that is ideal for various tasks which include cutting, chopping, dicing and slicing vegetables, fruits, fish, meat and other products. This santoku knife will help you with all your kitchen tasks and alleviate all your concerns.

Features: The Kitchen knife blade is made from incredibly razor sharp, premium German high carbon stainless steel 7Cr17Mov.Double-side groove design adds a gap between the blade and the material being cut, there is less contact between the food and the blade, so that cutting can be done quickly and easily.The ergonomic imported pakkawood handle on imarku’s professional santoku knife is lightweight and comfortable grip, and it features a deluxe steel end cap on the butt of the knife for superb balance.The full reinforcement between the blade and the handle serves as a finger guard while providing additional weight for perfect balance. It is safer to use.

Sharpness is key to achieving the best cuts The blade of this knife adopts premium German High Carbon stainless steel which is rust-proof, wear, stain and corrosion resistant.The thickness of this kitchen knife is 2.5mm(0.1inch), its hand-polished edge is 15-18 degrees per side, which is suitable for left-handed and right-handed people to get the job done perfectly. imarku knives are extremely sharp. Keep sharp items out of the reach of children. The performance of a knife can be diminished if not cared for properly. Cutlery should never be washed in a dishwasher because intense heat and harsh detergents may cause the handle to deteriorate. Carefully wash by hand with soap and warm water, rinse and dry with a soft towel. Do not soak or submerge in water for long periods of time or use chlorine bleach because it can pit and discolor the blade. Avoid soaking in aluminum or stainless steel sinks because these metals may cause pitting on the blade.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High-quality, sharp cooking knife
reviews.reviewText: Great value for the price. Very sharp, beautiful handle and blade. Use it every time I cut and prep vegetables for cooking. Great all-purpose knife.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sharp and beautiful knife
reviews.reviewText: A good knife, comes very sharp and looks nice. Balanced well, works well for chopping but blade is not thick enough to fully protect the hand when chopping on a flat surface, you'd need a different type of knife for that. But that isn't what this knife is made for, this is more general purpose. Works great in that role.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This was a Christmas gift, it's nice and sharp and the handle fits nicely in my hand, I have used it 10 times already and life it. The handle is easily gropped, and I feel secure us8ng it. It's worth every penny paid for this very good knife,

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this as a gift for my son who loves to cook! Only gave it 4 stars, based on the previous reviews. Looks like really sturdy, sharp knife. I am sure he will enjoy using it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This knife is easy to use, well balanced and extremely sharp. It fits nicely in an empty slot in my knife block.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Cuts really well and is very comfortable to cut with for long periods of time. I cook a lot and have difficulties with cutting things with knives for a long period of time as it really hurts my wrists. I have not experienced this with these knives.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent relation quality/price
reviews.reviewText: It is light in the hand but very sharp and accurate. It works very well and vegetable slices do not stick to it. Good buy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great knife for the price, solid, good grip, and SHARP!
Molto soddisfatto coltello di buona fattura super affilato e ben bilanciato

El filo esta bien y me parece mas practico que el cuchillo de cocinero que tengo para cortar frutas, verduras y papas. La hoja recta ayuda a picar tambien y la hoja no es super gruesa para que complique cortar papas o cosas que tengan una densidad superior. El cuchillo tiene el tamaño perfecto para mi ya que me permite maniobrarlo mas facilmente y tener mas precision en el corte. Lo unico es que me hubiera gustado es que al menos venga con una funda de plastico como la que vino mi otro cuchillo para cuidar el filo porque ahora la tengo que comprar la funda aparte. En lineas generales, estoy muy contenta con la compra.
Ho approfittato di uno sconto per dotarmi di questi coltello da cucina che si distingue per un ottima praticità e una qualità di taglio davvero ottima.
Comda l'impugnatura, robusto nell'insieme... Per carne e pane lo trovo poco affilato subito dopo le prime volte dell'uso, bisogna insistere un po'. Nell'insiemebuono
